    Descriptive Statistics for SPLT data

    John Flournoy

    2018-04-05

    Participants

    Data from four samples are used in this analysis. The first two samples comprise foster-care-involved and community adolescents who were recruited from the greater Eugene/Springfield area for an ongoing longitudinal study investigating decision-making related to health-risking behavior (NIH grant number:). The third and forth samples consisted of college students who completed the study for course credit either in person, or online. Some participants in each sample did not provide data on all focal measures (see Table @ref:missingstats), and so sample sizes for each analysis will differe to some extent. Examining the table, it is clear that the proportion of missing data is small.

    in table 2
